name: combineLatest(_:_:_:)
desc: Subscribes to three additional publishers and publishes a tuple upon receiving output from any of the publishers.
declaration: func combineLatest<P, Q, R>(_ publisher1: P, _ publisher2: Q, _ publisher3: R) -> Publishers.CombineLatest4<Self, P, Q, R> where P : Publisher, Q : Publisher, R : Publisher, Self.Failure == P.Failure, P.Failure == Q.Failure, Q.Failure == R.Failure
